posts.postText:
Hey NNJG, i noticed you have ttt_forest_b4 on your server, I'm the maker (I like seeing other servers play my maps :D) Heads up - there's a newer version out (ttt_forest_final).

Pics:
 http://img207.imageshack.us/img207/2959/15132600.jpg 
 http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/3531/96449291.jpg 
 http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/6403/tttforestfinal0002.jpg 
 http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/2100/tttforestfinal0004.jpg 

Download: http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=125612

Thanks.
-Pete
Thanks for the information! I'm sure our owners will replace it when they have the chance!

The map has been updated, thanks for the notice! With that being said, sorry for the delay, I'm pretty sure there was another thread about this, but at the time I was busy; by the time I had a chance to upload it I completely forgot about it.

>> -- by the time I had a chance to upload it I completely forgot about it. 

*clears throat*
